title: Medical monitoring template for visualization of summarized data
description: This report summarizes the data of interest (with the \code{\link{inTextSummaryTable}} package) and visualize it with any medical monitoring plot function.

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

dataTotalProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for 'dataTotalFileName', passed to \link[medicalMonitoring]{processData}

tableParams.doc: parameters to summarize the data in a table, passed to \link[inTextSummaryTable]{computeSummaryStatisticsTable}

tableProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for the summary table, passed to \link[medicalMonitoring]{processData}

plotFunction.doc: plotting function to visualize summary data
